title: Loading Animation
reference-overview: Loading animation is useful in letting users know that the server is processing the request. It is an animated icon and is displayed in a modal.
reference-usage: It's used when an action is happening behind the scenes, and informs the user to wait for a while before are returned.
reference-details:
Cancel Button

  • The cancel button is displayed to allow the user to cancel out of the action.
  • The button should be the secondary class.
reference-mobile: Animation expands to fill the allotted row space, while font size increases. Any button adheres to mobile configuration.
reference-technical:
Cross Browser Compatibility

IE9 doesn't crop background gradients on containers with rounded corners, so we square the corners of every container so it looks just like IE8.
